Changing the password will lock the dash: Updating your password will lock the dashboard. You will need to unlock the dashboard with your new password.
Clicking the button your system will sca: Wifi functionality is currently an ALPHA feature and very buggy. Click the scan button to search for available wifi networks. Once connected you will need to navigate to the new Wifi IP address in your local network.
In ECO mode your miner will consume less: In ECO mode your miner will at its most effiecent (about <0>1.0W/MHs</0>) but its hashrate will be slightly slower. This mode is recommended, and will produce the least amount of noise and heat.
In Turbo mode your miner will consume mo: In Turbo mode your miner will be the least effiecent (about <0>1.4W/MHs</0>) but its hashrate will be slightly faster. This mode is only recommended for expert users, and you should monitor your miner for possible overheating.
There are no wifi networks available yet: There are no wifi networks available yet. Please click the scan button to search for available networks in your vicinity.
Welcome to the wizard setup. Here you ca: Welcome to the wizard setup. You only need to fill out the below info to get started quickly. You can skip this step and configure your miner later. To add more pools or change any other configuration go to the settings page after closing this window.
Your controller should be connected to W: Your controller should be connected to WIFI now. Try to go to <0>{address}</0> before disconnecting the ethernet cable. Please note, if new IP does not work, you might need to reboot the system and remove the ethernet cable for the miner to connect to your WIFI network.
<0>* Required</0> Please set a password: <0>* Required</0> Please set a password for this dashboard to prevent unauthorized access. If you forget this password you will need to re-image your SD card, there is no way to recover it.
Clicking the button your system will sca: Wifi functionality is currently an ALPHA feature and very buggy. Click the scan button to search for available wifi networks. Once connected you will need to navigate to the new Wifi IP address in your local network.
In BALANCED mode your miner will consume: BALANCED mode is a good compromise between hashrate, efficiency, and noise (about <0>1.2W/MHs</0>).
In ECO mode your miner will consume less: In ECO mode your miner will be at its most efficient (about <0>1.0W/MHs</0>) but its hashrate will be slightly slower. This mode is recommended, and will produce the least amount of noise and heat.
In Turbo mode your miner will consume mo: In TURBO mode your miner will be the least effiecent (about <0>1.4W/MHs</0>) but its hashrate will be slightly faster. This mode is only recommended for expert users, and you should monitor your miner for possible overheating. The fan can get VERY loud in this mode.
Put the slider to the minimum to set aut: Setting the slider to minimum value will put Fan control in Auto Mode (recommended). You can set custom fan speeds here, but make sure you monitor miner temperature.
The Apollo comes with tuned preset value: The Apollo comes with tuned preset values (above), which offer a good range of operating modes. By selecting custom you risk damaging your device and FutureBit will not be responsible for any or all damage caused by over-clocking or over-volting
You can create an account on <0>Litecoin: You can create an account on <0>Litecoinpool.org</0> and use <1>stratum+tcp://litecoinpool.org:3333</1> as the pool url or you can use any other pool compatible with Scrypt algorithm coins. Visit <2>Litecoinpool.org/help</2> for additional information on how pool mining works and detailed FAQ on setting up your account.
